# IntroVox v1.1.2 - Nextcloud App Store Upload Instructions

## Release Details
Version: 1.1.2
Date: 2025-11-16
GitHub Release: https://github.com/nextcloud/IntroVox/releases/tag/v1.1.2

## Release Notes
This is a re-release of v1.1.1 to resolve signature verification issues encountered during App Store installation. The functionality is identical to v1.1.1 - only the release process and signature have been regenerated.

## Upload to Nextcloud App Store

### Method 1: Web Interface (Recommended)

1. Go to: https://apps.nextcloud.com/account/apps
2. Click on "IntroVox"
3. Go to "Releases" tab
4. Click "Upload release"
5. Fill in the form:

**Download URL:**
https://github.com/nextcloud/IntroVox/releases/download/v1.1.2/introvox-v1.1.2.tar.gz

**Signature (base64-encoded SHA512):**


**Nextcloud min version:** 32
**Nextcloud max version:** 32

6. Click "Upload"

### Method 2: Using cURL (if you have API token)

curl -X POST https://apps.nextcloud.com/api/v1/apps/introvox/releases \
  -H "Authorization: Token YOUR_API_TOKEN" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "download": "https://github.com/nextcloud/IntroVox/releases/download/v1.1.2/introvox-v1.1.2.tar.gz",
    "signature": "",
    "nightly": false
  }'

## Verification

After upload, verify at: https://apps.nextcloud.com/apps/introvox

The new version should appear within a few minutes.

## Changelog Entry

## [1.1.2] - 2025-11-16

### Fixed
- **App Store signature verification** - Re-release to resolve signature verification issues
  - Identical functionality to v1.1.1
  - Fresh release tarball with correct cryptographic signature
  - Resolves "invalid signature" errors during installation from App Store
